maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: B-\.Bien sûr je te rendrai l'argent...\. Donc...\. hum...\. S'il vous plait ?

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: ...Oh !\. E-\.Est-ce que cette \c[3]\v[item.30.name]\c[0] est pour moi ?

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: At my age, neither way is the easy way.

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Jean

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: J'en tremble encore...
... Salut ?

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: I mean, you won't believe what happened.

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: I was running on an off-road path here in Bergen Trail.
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: J'étais en train de courir sur un hors-sentier ici sur le \v[area.bergen-trails.name]...

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: Suddenly, this \c[3]HUGE\c[0] and \c[3]VICIOUS\c[0] bunny-creature attacks me from the side.
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: ... quand soudain, cette créature \c[3]ÉNORME\c[0] et \c[3]SANGUINAIRE\c[0] de lapin m'a attaqué sur le côté.

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: I was so surprised I just ran down here and collapsed.
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: J'étais si effrayé que j'ai couru ici et que je me suis évanouie.

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: I mean, I heard there was a super strong monster in the mountains, but...
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Je veux dire, j'ai déjà cru comprendre qu'il y avait une créature super féroce dans les montagnes, mais...

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: I can't believe it. I still have to become much stronger.
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Je n'arrive pas à y croire. Je pense qu'il faut encore que je devienne plus fort.

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Tu es revenue ! Et juste à temps !

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: I found a capture device!
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: J'ai trouvé un appareil de capture !

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: Yeah, it was super expensive, but it's totally worth it.
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Oui, il était super cher, mais ça valait le coup.

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: Did you get the \v[item.139.name]s?
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Est-ce que tu as les Carottes Congelées ?

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: [nods]
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: [acquiesce]

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: Very nice!
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Très bien !

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: Now we only have to capture this legendary bunny or whatever people call it.
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Maintenant il faut juste capturer ce lapin légendaire ou peu importe comment les gens l'appelle.

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: From what I understood, the guys I got my info from said you have to bring the \v[item.139.name]s to \c[3]Windy Climb\c[0].
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: De ce que j'en ai compris, il faut apporter les Carottes Congelées sur la \c[3]Côte au Grand Vent\c[0].

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: As I said, it's a part of Bergen Trail.
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Comme je disais, c'est une partie du \v[area.bergen-trails.name].

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: Turns out, it was the same part I was attacked in!
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Et oui, c'est le même endroit que là ou j'ai été attaquée !

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: Right? Which means we just have to get the \v[item.139.name]s to that place.
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Hein ? Ça veut dire qu'il faut juste apporter les Carottes Congelées à cet endroit.

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: The guys said just having the capture device and defeating the monster would capture it.
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Mes potes m'ont dit que juste avoir l'appareil de capture et de vaincre le monstre devrait le capturer.

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: [nods]
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: [acquiesce]

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: So\..\..\.. Here you go. Take the device.
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Donc\..\..\.. Tiens ! Prends l'appareil.

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: What?\.\. Did you think I would go up there again?
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Quoi ?\.\. Tu pensais pas que j'allais retourner là-bas ?

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: Never\.\. ever!
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Non\.\. Jamais !

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: Come on, you got the carrots too. I'm not really a fighter...
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Allez, tu as déjà les carottes. Je ne suis pas vraiment un combattant...

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: It's not because I'm scared or whatever.
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Ce n'est pas que j'ai peur ou quoi que ce soit.

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: Thanks! I know you can do it! But prepare yourself!
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Merci ! Je sais que tu peux le faire ! Mais prépare-toi bien pour ça !

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: This creature must be super strong.
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Cette créature doit être super forte.

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: [nods]
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: [acquiesce]

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: Jean
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Jean

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Hé Lea ! Est-ce que tu as combattu le lapin ?

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: [shakes head]
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: [secoue la tête]

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: A.. Ah.. Alright. Don't push yourself okay? I was told it is super strong!
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: A... Ah... C'est bon. Ne te force pas trop, OK ? On m'a dit qu'il était vraiment très fort !

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: It should be somewhere in the \c[3]Windy Climb\c[0] parts of Bergen Trail!
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Il devrait être quelque part du côté de la \c[3]Côte au Grant Vent\c[0] du \v[area.bergen-trails.name].

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: Jean
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Jean

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: Hey, Lea!
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Hé, Lea !

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: Hi!
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Salut !

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: Wow, you seem exhausted!
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Waouw, tu m'as l'air d'être essoufflée !

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: Wait... does that mean \..\..\.. you captured it?
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Attends... Ça veut dire\..\..\.. Tu l'as capturé ?

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: Oh my gosh, really?!
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Oh mon dieu. Vraiment ?!

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: I bet it was super hard to beat, right?
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: J'imagine qu'il était super dur à battre, non ?

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: [nods]
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: [acquiesce]

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: Thanks so much Lea! C... Can I have it?
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Merci beaucoup, Lea ! J... Je peux l'avoir ?

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: [nods]
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: [acquiesce]

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: Wow, kinda looks like a normal \c[3]\v[combat.name.gray-frobbit]\c[0] don't you think?
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Ouah, il ressemble beaucoup à un \c[3]\v[combat.name.gray-frobbit]\c[0] normal, tu penses pas ?

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: I thought it would have dark red eyes and bloody fur or something.
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Je pensais qu'il avait les yeux rouge sombre et des poils plein de sang et tout.

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: Well, what matters is that we captured it, right?
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Mais bon, ce qui compte, c'est qu'on l'a capturé, non ?

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: Alright, alright\..\..\.. you did it!
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Oui bon, oui bon\.\.\. Tu l'as capturé !

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: Again, thank you so much!
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Encore, merci beaucoup !

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: I have to log off and show this to my friends. They won't believe it!
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Il faut que je me déconnecte et que je montre ça à mes amis. Ils n'en reviendront pas !

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: A live legendary monster in my inventory! \.\.Super awesome!
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Un monstre légendaire vivant dans mon inventaire !\.\. Trop génial !

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: Here, take this as a reward.
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Tiens, prends ça comme récompense.

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: Bye, Lea! Hope to speak to you soon!
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Bye, Lea ! J'espère qu'on se reverra bientôt !

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: Bye!
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Bye !

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: Lea hi, hi Lea!
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Lea salut, salut Lea !

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: ... I assume that means: Me too?
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: ... J'imagine que ça veut dire "moi aussi" ?

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: [nods]
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: [acquiesce]

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: Hehe, no problem. It was nice meeting you.
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Héhé, pas de problème. C'était bien de t'avoir rencontré.

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: You are not going to tell her it is just a regular Young Frobbit?
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Tu ne vas pas lui dire que c'est juste un \v[combat.name.gray-frobbit] normal ?

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: [Shakes Head]
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: [secoue la tête]

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: Mh.. I guess it is probably better this way.
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Mmm... C'est peut-être mieux comme ça.

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: \c[3]Bergen Trail\c[0], here we are!
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Le \c[3]\v[area.bergen-trails.name]\c[0], nous y voilà !

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: So where is Monsieur Grasshead? Don't tell me he's late...\.
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Donc où est Monsieur Tête-d'Herbe ? Me dis pas qu'il est en retard...\.

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: Blue-haired Spheromancer!
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Spheromanceuse aux Cheveux Bleus !

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: Finally, you've arrived!
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Enfin, te voilà !

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: It is time for our duel!
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Le temps est venu de faire notre duel !

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: As for the location, this place here is just perfect.
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Et cet endroit ici est idéal pour ça.

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: Isn't it kinda crowded here?
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Ce n'est pas un peu bondé ici ?

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: Why, that's exactly the point!
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Oui, c'est exactement le but !

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: People should witness the grace of the Spheromancer's fighting style!
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Les gens se doivent d'observer l'élégance du style de combat des Spheromancers !

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: I see...
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Je vois...

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: Now, there is no reason to rush.
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Bon, il y a pas lieu de se précipiter.

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: Prepare yourself and tell me when you're ready to start.
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Prépare-toi et dis-moi lorsque tu es prête pour commencer.

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: Though I hardly believe there is any reason for you to prepare with \c[1]your kind of level\c[0].
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Bien qu'il n'y ait aucune raison pour toi de te préparer vu \c[1]ton niveau\c[0].

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: Damn straight!\. We'll serve you the beating of a lifetime!
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Ça tu peux le dire !\. On va te mettre la raclée de ta vie !

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: And don't even think about chickening out.
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Et ne pense même pas pouvoir y échapper.
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.note: de: tirer d'affaire, except it could mean winning here...

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: Hell no! We're gonna show you!
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Ah non ! On va te montrer !

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: Must I remind you of the definition of a duel?
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Est-ce que je dois te rappeler la définition d'un duel ?

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: It's Spheromancer versus Spheromancer.
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: C'est Spheromancer contre Spheromancer.

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: No Pentafist.
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Pas de Pentafist.

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: Oui, oui, I know!
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Oui, oui, je sais !

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: I'm gonna watch as Lea beats you up!
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Je vais juste regarder pendant que Lea te cogne !

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: Anyway. Just talk to me when you're ready.
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: En tout cas, dis-moi quand tu es prête.

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: Yes...\. beating you with those \c[1]stats\c[0] will be very challenging.
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Tu peux toujours essayer avec tes stats. Mais n'essaye même pas d'utiliser ça comme une excuse.

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: But I'll show you what a true Spheromancer is capable of!
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Mais je vais te montrer ce dont un véritable Spheromancer est capable !

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: Hm...\. Your \c[3]stats seem rather low\c[0]. I suggest you upgrade your \c[3]circuits\c[0] and \c[3]equipment\c[0] before the duel.
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Hm...\. Tes \c[3]stats semblent assez faibles\c[0]. Je te conseille d'améliorer tes \c[3]circuits\c[0] et tes \c[3]équipements\c[0] avant le duel.

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: You can still challenge with your current stats, but don't even think about using it as an excuse.
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Tu peux toujours essayer avec tes stats. Mais n'essaye même pas d'utiliser ça comme une excuse.

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: What.
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Hein.

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: What is the deal with your \c[3]stats\c[0].
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: C'est quoi le truc avec tes \c[3]stats\c[0].

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: This explains why I waited for so long. You took your time to prepare.
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Ça explique pourquoi j'ai attendu si longtemps. Tu as pris ton temps pour te préparer.

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: Oh well, let's get this over with.
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Mais bon. Finissons-en.

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: I see you worked hard!
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Je vois que tu y as mis du cœur !

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: Those are some \c[3]excellent stats\c[0]. This is going to be interesting!
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Ce sont des \c[3]stats excellentes\c[0]. Ça va être intéressant !

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: I see you are prepared.
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Je vois que tu t'es préparée.

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: Are you ready for the duel?
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Es-tu prête pour le duel ?

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: [nods]
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: [acquiesce]

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: Good.
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Bien.

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: Pentafist! It's time for you to step back.
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Pentafist ! Il est temps pour toi de t'écarter.

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: Oui, oui.
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Oui, oui.

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: Get ready!
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Prépare-toi !

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: PvP Combat, ACTIVATE!
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Combat PvP, ACTIVATION !

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: What is it? Is this your first PvP battle?
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Quoi ? C'est ton premier combat PvP ?

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: [nods]
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: [acquiesce]

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: \c[3]Player versus Player\c[0]. It's simple.
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: \c[3]Player versus Player\c[0]. C'est simple.

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: We fight several rounds.\. \c[3]5 out of 9\c[0].\. No items.\. No escape.
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: On combat pendant 9 rounds.\. Au bout de \c[3]5 victoires, le combat est gagné\c[0].\. Pas d'items.\. Pas d'échappatoire.

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: Go Lea!!\. I'm sure you can do it!
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Allez Lea !!\. Je sais que tu peux le faire !

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: The time has come...
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Le temps est venu...

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: I, \c[3]Apollo\c[0], will show you the right path.
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Moi, \c[3]Apollo\c[0], vais te montrer le droit chemin.

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: The path of a proper Spheromancer!
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Le chemin d'un véritable Spheromancer !

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: The path...\.\. of \c[3]Justice\c[0]!
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Le chemin...\.\. de la \c[3]Justice\c[0] !

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: Let the duel begin!
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Que le duel, commence !

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: [shakes head]
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: [secoue la tête]

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: Alright. Don't make me wait too long.
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Bon. Ne me fais pas attendre trop longtemps.

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: [yes]
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: [oui]

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: [no]
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: [non]

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: W-WHAT?!?!\. WHAT IS THIS DAMAGE?!
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Q-QUOI ?!?!\. C'EST QUOI CES DÉGÂTS DE FOLIE ?!

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: This round goes to you. Not bad!
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Ce round est pour toi. Pas mal !

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: THIS IS \c[1]CHEATING\c[0]! AN UNPRECEDENTED LEVEL OF \c[1]CHEATING\c[0]!!
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: C'EST DE LA \c[1]TRICHE\c[0] ! DE LA \c[1]TRICHERIE\c[0] D'UN NIVEAU JAMAIS ATTEINT !!

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: Time to show you the true potential of a Spheromancer!
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Il est temps de te montrer le véritable potentiel d'un Spheromancer !

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: Whoa, go easy on him, Lea!
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Wouah, vas-y mollo avec lui, Lea !

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: YOU DIRTY \c[1]CHEATER\c[0]! YOU SHOULD BE ASHAMED!!!
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: ESPÈCE DE SALE \c[1]TRICHEUSE\c[0] ! TU DEVRAIS AVOIR HONTE !!!

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: You can do it, Lea!!
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Tu peux le faire, Lea !!

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: THIS HAS NOTHING TO DO WITH SKILLS!\. THIS IS \c[1]MADNESS\c[0]!!
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: ÇA N'A RIEN AVOIR AVEC UN QUELCONQUE TALENT !\. C'EST DE \c[1]LA FOLIE\c[0] !!

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: This isn't over yet!!
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Ce n'est pas encore fini !!

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: Was that all?
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: C'est tout ?

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: Again with a single hit?\. What is this?
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Je t'ai encore eu avec un seul coup ?\. Comment ça se fait ?

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: Uhm...\. this is indeed strange...
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Euh...\. c'est effectivement étrange...

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: Witness the true potential of a Spheromancer!
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Et maintenant je vais te montrer le vrai potentiel d'un Spheromancer !

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: Lea are you okay?!\. Why are you dying so quickly?
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Lea, qu'est-ce que tu as ?!\. Pourquoi tu meurs aussi rapidement ?

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: Oh no... Don't tell me this is another issue...
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Oh non... Me dit pas qu'il y a un autre problème...

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: Don't give up, Lea!\. Punch him!\. Punch him hard!
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: N'abandonne pas, Lea !\. Frappe-le !\. Frappe-le bien fort !

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: How is it even possible to have so little HP and defense?!\. Is this another kind of \c[3]cheating\c[0]?!
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Comment c'est possible d'avoir aussi peu d'HP et de défense ?!\. Est-ce que c'est une autre sorte de \c[3]triche\c[0] ?!

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: Alright. Time to end this!
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Bon ! Il est temps d'en finir !

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: YOU \c[1]CHEATER\c[0]!! YOU'VE BEEN CHEATING!!
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: \c[1]TRICHEUSE\c[0] !! TU AS TRICHÉ !!

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: NOT ONLY THE GAME, BUT YOURSELF!
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: CE N'EST PAS QUE LE JEU QUE TU AS DUPÉ, C'EST TOI-MÊME !
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.note: meme. numerama translated it, but it's pretty hollow: https://www.numerama.com/pop-culture/479837-le-debat-sur-la-difficulte-de-sekiro-shadows-die-twice-offre-des-memes-tres-droles.html

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: YOU DIDN'T \c[3]GROW\c[0] OR \c[3]IMPROVE\c[0]!
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: TU N'EN ES RESSORTIE NI \c[3]GRANDIE\c[0] NI \c[3]AMÉLIORÉE\c[0] !

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: YOU TOOK A SHORTCUT AND GAINED \c[3]NOTHING\c[0]!
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: TU AS PRIS UN RACCOURCI ET TU N'AS \c[3]RIEN GAGNÉ DU TOUT\c[0] !

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: ALL YOU EXPERIENCED IS A \c[1]HOLLOW VICTORY\c[0]!
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: UN \c[1]TRIOMPHE SANS GLOIRE\c[0], C'EST TOUT CE QUE TU AS OBTENU !

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig:
NOTHING was \c[1]RISKED\c[0]!
NOTHING was \c[1]GAINED\c[0]!
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text:
Tu n'as pris AUCUN \c[1]RISQUE\c[0] !
Tu n'as RIEN \c[1]GAGNÉ\c[0] !

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: It's \c[1]SAD\c[0] that you don't know the difference.
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: C'est \c[1]TRISTE\c[0] que tu ne puisses pas faire la différence.

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: Wow there, dude...
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Wouah, mec, du calme...
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.note: halblang machen: exagérer, beware of context through

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: Not a very surprising outcome, is it?
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Ce résultat était assez prévisible, n'est-ce pas ?

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: Do you feel any \c[1]accomplishment\c[0], over-powered as you are?
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: As-tu eu le sentiment d'avoir \c[1]accompli quelque chose\c[0], en étant aussi surpuissante ?

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: Well, even despite your level and stats, I still have to insist...
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Bon, même malgré ton niveau et tes statistiques, il faut quand même que j'insiste...

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: It looks like I underestimated you.
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: On dirait que je t'ai sous-estimée.

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: Yes, you are indeed a worthy opponent!
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Oui, tu es bien un adversaire digne de ce nom !

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: I'm glad to know that skilled Spheromancers remain among us.
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: C'est bon de savoir que les Spheromancers expérimentés existent encore parmi nous.

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: However!
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Mais !

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: I HONESTLY SHOULD \c[1]REPORT YOU IMMEDIATELY\c[0]!
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: JE DEVRAIS TE \c[1]SIGNALER SUR LE CHAMP\c[0] !

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: Yet it PAINS me to no end, that a SPHEROMANCER out of all classes commits such a dire crime!
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Pourtant ça me fait MAL à un tel point, que de toutes les classes, ça soit un SPHEROMANCER qui ait pu commettre un tel crime !

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: I shall find a way to BREAK your cheating habits, personally!
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Je vais devoir chercher PERSONNELLEMENT un moyen de te dissuader de tricher !

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: We shall meet again, blue-haired Spheromancer!
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Nous nous reverrons, Spheromanceuse aux cheveux bleus !

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: You have yet to unlock the true potential of this class!
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Il te faut encore découvrir tout le vrai potentiel de cette classe !

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: That...\. was weird.
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: C'était...\. étrange.

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: Being defeated so quickly...\. this smells like \c[1]cheating\c[0] to me!
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: D'être vaincue aussi rapidement...\. Pour moi, il y a comme de la \c[1]tricherie\c[0] dans l'air !

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: It would be a very weird reason to cheat...\. but it's cheating none the less!
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Ce serait vraiment curieux comme raison de tricher...\. mais c'est de la triche quand même !

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: It looks like you still have much to learn.
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: On dirait que tu as encore beaucoup à apprendre.

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: You are nowhere near unlocking the true potential of the Spheromancer!
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Tu es loin d'avoir découvert le vrai potentiel d'un Spheromancer !

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: Yet there is still time.
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Mais tu as encore le temps.

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: Train hard, and you may become worthy of your class!
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Entraîne-toi, et peut-être que tu deviendras digne de cette classe !

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: Next time we meet, I'll make sure to test your skills once more!
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: La prochaine fois que l'on se rencontre, je ferais en sorte de retester tes capacités !

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: Until then, blue-haired Spheromancer!
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: À plus tard, Spheromanceuse aux cheveux bleus !

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: Lea.
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Lea.

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: Serious monsieur is very serious.
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Monsieur Tête d'Herbe est vraiment très sérieux.

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: Looks like you got yourself a rival, Lea.
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: On dirait que tu t'es trouvé un rival, Lea.

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: You really did kick his derrière, though! That was awesome!
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Tu lui as bien botté le derrière, par contre. C'était super !

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: Well, don't worry too much about losing this duel.
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Mais, ne t'inquiète pas trop d'avoir perdu ce duel.

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: That guy seemed pretty experienced, non?
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Ce mec avait l'air expérimenté, non ?

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: I'm sure you'll have plenty of opportunites to get your revenge!
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Je suis sûr que tu auras plein d'occasions pour prendre ta revanche !

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: [nods]
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: [acquiesce]

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: Anyway... I really have to go now.
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: En tout cas... Il faut vraiment que j'y aille maintenant.

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: Seriously, we've been playing for so long!
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Franchement, on a joué vraiment trop longtemps !

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: But it was so much fun!
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Mais c'était tellement trop fun !

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: So let's play together again next time, d'accord?
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Donc la prochaine fois on continue de jouer ensemble, d'accord ?

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: [nods]
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: [acquiesce]

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: Très bien! Until then.
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Très bien ! À plus !

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: Au revoir!
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Au revoir !

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: Bye
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Bye

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: Bye!!
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Bye !!

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: Huh?\. Ah, oui! Good bye!
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Hein ?\. Ah, oui ! Bye bye !

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: See you soon!
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: À bientôt !

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: Logout
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Déconnexion

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: It looks like I added the word just in the nick of time.
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: On dirait que je t'ai ajouté ce mot juste à temps.

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: [nods]
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: [acquiesce]

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: I figured you would need it sooner or later.
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Je me disais que tu finirais par en avoir besoin, tôt ou tard.

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: Well then, I think we should call it a day as well.
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Bon, je pense que nous aussi, on devrait se dire que c'est tout pour aujourd'hui.

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: I kind of need a break myself, to be frank.
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: J'ai besoin d'une pause, pour dire les choses franchement.

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: Do not worry... You will be back in the game soon enough.
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Ne t'inquiète pas... Tu reviendras très bientôt dans le jeu.

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: Good night, Lea.
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Bonne nuit, Lea.

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: Logout
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Déconnexion

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: Going ahead already?
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Tu veux déjà partir ?

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: You accepted the duel! I am waiting!
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Tu as accepté le duel ! J'attends !

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: Come on, Lea!\. Monsieur is waiting for his beating.
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Allez, Lea !\. Monsieur attend sa raclée.

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: Sure feels nice to have a change of landscape.
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Ça fait du bien d'avoir un paysage un peu différent.

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: I don't think I wanna see another apple in a while.
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Parce que là je n'ai plus envie de voir des pommes.

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: But I've heard that we could actually do more quests in Rookie Harbor now.
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Mais j'ai cru comprendre que l'on peut faire d'autres quêtes maintenant à \v[area.rookie-harbor.name].

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: Sounds like a good idea before climbing that mountain, right?
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Ça semble être une bonne idée avant de grimper sur cette montagne, non ?

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: B... but... you wanna walk all the way back for that?
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: M... Mais... tu veux reprendre toute la route pour ça ?

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: Well, there IS this quick-travel system, you know...
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Ben, il y a le système de voyage rapide, tu sais...

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: Initializing avatar
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Initialisation avatar

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: Good morning, Lea!
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Bonjour, Lea !

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: ...\. Are you alright?
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: ...\. Tout va bien ?

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: [nods]
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: [acquiesce]

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: And...\. you still remember everything from yesterday, right?\. Meeting Emilie and all that?
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Et...\. tu te souviens encore de tout ce qui s'est passé hier ?\. d'avoir rencontré Emilie et tout ?

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: [nods]
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: [acquiesce]

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: Alright, great!
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: C'est bon alors !

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: Oh, by the way!\. It seems that Emilie is online as-
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Tiens, pendant qu'on y est !\. On dirait qu'Emilie est déjà en ligne en ce mom-

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: Oh.\. That must be her.
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Oh.\. Ça doit être elle.

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: It is like a phone call. Just take it!
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: C'est comme un appel téléphonique. Prends-le !

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: Bonjour, Lea!
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Bonjour, Lea !

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: Hi!
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: Salut !

maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.orig: This is a Direct Link!\. First time you've seen it?
maps/bergen-trail/path-1-entrance.json/e.text: C'est un Direct Link !\. C'est la première fois que tu vois ça ?
